title: RITO Halp! Secondary Support = Primary Support?
body:
Could you guys please double check the role assignment algorithms?
Over the past 21 games (didn't bother to check further back as the pattern is identical), I have queued up choosing primary jungle and secondary support.

Out of those 21 games, I had a whopping 4 games where I got my supposedly "primary" role, 17 were support matchups.
That is seriously out of whack. 

I don't mind playing support at all, hence I chose it as secondary role, but would be really nice if I could play my primary role as well.

replies.body: Update: Now running at 22/26 as secondary role. Ugh.

i stopped chosing support as a secondary because i think that it is probably the least desirable pick so you will get picked as a support more often over your primary, jungle probably being the most popular.
Yeah i have the same problem.
